---
title: "About"
---

This website aims to provide guidance on best practice for setting up and developing packages within Public Health Scotland. 

The website was developed in [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and has the following contributors (in alphabetical order):

- [Nick Christofides](https://github.com/Nic-Chr)
- [Jon Minton](https://github.com/jonminton)
- [Csilla Scharle](https://github.com/csillasch)
- [Alan Yeung](https://github.com/alan-y)

The repository containing the code for the website is publically available on github [here](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/package-dev-guidance-site). You can contribute by either [raising an issue](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/package-dev-guidance-site/issues), or forking the repo and [making a pull request](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/package-dev-guidance-site/pulls).
